channel.title: Client Freezing [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys...
So I added the new login RS Box to my client and it works perfectly.
But when you log out and try to log in you get errors and it freezes:
[code=text] NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 6,0,0 - 49,47,49,10,87,101, action-ID: 1021 action-ID: 315 button: 2458, toggle: -1, type: 135 Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 6,2728,3728 - 49,47,49,10,87,101, Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8992) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9759) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:138) at client.run(client.java:4974) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Help plox?
Thanks, RS PS
I did post this in the client section about 2 hours ago but no one replied so I thought I would try here.

item.title: Client Freezing [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Just because no one replied to your topic (that’s only been up for, as you say, 2 hours) does not give you permission to post it else where.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Freezing [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Hey guys…

So I added the new login RS Box to my client and it works perfectly.

But when you log out and try to log in you get errors and it freezes:

NPC.DAT : 1489108188
Called method225
NPC.IDX : 1489126980
Called method225
602 NPC Amount: 11257
Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 6,0,0 - 49,47,49,10,87,101,
action-ID: 1021
action-ID: 315
button: 2458, toggle: -1, type: 135
Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 6,2728,3728 - 49,47,49,10,87,101,
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8992)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:9759)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:138)
        at client.run(client.java:4974)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Help plox?

Thanks, RS PS

I did post this in the client section about 2 hours ago but no one replied so I thought I would try here.

Read full topic
